channel.title: The Young Bond series
channel.description:
The Young Bond series is a series of books written by Charlie Higson based on the childhood adventures of James Bond and is set around the time of the 2nd World War I presume.
I started reading these books a few days ago and I have to say I enjoyed them and I do recommend it to others. I couldn't find the 1st and 4th books at my school library and the local community library but I have managed to read the 2nd, 3rd and 5th books being Blood Fever, Double or Die and By Royal Command.
Summary by Wikipedia
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Young_Bond
So has anyone else had past experiences with these books and how did they like it?

item.title: The Young Bond series
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:10, topic:286000”]Also, just so this is out in the open…

DANIEL CRAIG SUCKS DICK[/quote]

Daniel Craig is the only real Bond as ‘seen’ in the books so far. The others were far too unrealistic. I loved the other Bond movies, but the ones with Craig are of a different kind, almost a different subgenre.

Read full topic

item.title: The Young Bond series
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:10, topic:286000”]Also, just so this is out in the open…

DANIEL CRAIG SUCKS DICK[/quote]
imo Daniel Crag is the best bond so far, he just pulls of the ‘ruthless’ aura that Ian Fleming got across in the books.

just my 2 cents.

Read full topic

item.title: The Young Bond series
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:7, topic:286000”]I don’t like it, and I’ve never read a book of the series. It’s just because Bond is Bond. You don’t know his history, and you shouldn’t. It’s part of the mystery.

Oh, and it just sounds gay. Don’t know why, but it does.[/quote]
while this is true i can understand why they did it, they needed to rejuvenate the younger generations love for james bond of the book form, as these days reading has declined

Read full topic

sanga282:

ian fleming was better

item.title: The Young Bond series
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I don’t like it, and I’ve never read a book of the series. It’s just because Bond is Bond. You don’t know his history, and you shouldn’t. It’s part of the mystery.

Oh, and it just sounds gay. Don’t know why, but it does.

item.title: The Young Bond series
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Man UTD Freak, post:3, topic:286000”][quote author=PeterMan link=topic=378256.msg2846043#msg2846043 date=1246289760]
I don’t know anything about these books, but I will say express myself: A young bond series? That sounds retarded.

[/quote]

Fair enough if that’s your opinion but never judge a book until you’ve actually read it, a saying that you may have heard a few times before.[/quote]
I’m just saying it SOUNDS retarded, not that it is retarded, but hey, what do I know.

Read full topic
